musicField.title: **Music**
musicField.content: **!play** - Play a song by his name or a youtube URL. **!stop** - Stop the song and disconnect (can be used with the playlist). **!pause** - Pause the song (can be used with the playlist). **!resume** - Resume the song (can be used with the playlist).

playlistField.title: **Playlist**
playlistField.content: **!playlist list** - Get the list of you playlist. **!playlist add** - Add a song in your playlist. **!playlist remove** - Remove a song of your playlist. **!playlist clear** - Clear your playlist. **!playlist play** - Play your playlist. **!playlist random** - Play your playlist in random mode. **!playlist {number}** - Play a specific song of your playlist. **!playlist skip** - Skip to your next playlist song. **!playlist export** - Export your playlist save's file. **!playlist import** - Import a playlist from a playlist save's file.

othersField.title: **Others**
othersField.content: **!help** - Show the different commands. **!date** - Get the current date and time. **!ping** - Return the bot ping and latency. **!name** - Get the name of the bot. **!invite** - Get the bot's invite link.
